Automation is today one of the most highlighted parts of digital transformation and will be an essential part of every business going forward. Join us at Jounce as a Process Automation Consultant! About the company
Jounce was founded in April 2020 in Stockholm by three automation consultants aiming to develop organizations through automation technologies ‚Äì to create real value with a long-term perspective. We recently got a new member of the Jounce family and hope to expand even more in 2022. Our clients include everything from smaller local businesses to large multi-national enterprises. We work with clients across all industries, such as finance, the public sector, retail and manufacturing, insurance, etc. Automation is drastically changing the way an organization does business, and we are here to help prepare and realize that journey. You will be responsible, together with the whole Jounce team, to design and develop processes using various techniques as RPA, Machine Learning, AI in order for customers to streamline and automate different business processes. In addition to being responsible for designing and developing automations, you will also be involved in sales meetings as a technical expert. You will help free up customers‚Äô business teams from working on mundane, repetitive tasks, allowing them to accelerate their contribution to their own business growth and success by engaging in high-value activities & innovation. You will develop solutions from scratch in a tech stack that includes
‚Ä¢	Robotic Process Automation with UiPath as the main tool. ‚Ä¢	Microservices with infrastructure code in the cloud (like Azure). ‚Ä¢	Modular and scalable backends in Python. ‚Ä¢	Intelligent automation. In short, you will deliver something we like to call full-stack automation so that our clients can keep the focus on their core businesses. Your profile
We believe you are driven, curious, and have a passionate interest in new and innovative technology. You have good communication skills, a good sense of troubleshooting in an independent way and thrive in the role of consultant. With the right mindset and ambition, you‚Äôll find plenty of room to grow in your role. Our business and tech radar develops from diversity within our workplace. Professionally, we also hope that you...
‚Ä¢	Have experience with object-oriented programming languages. ‚Ä¢	Work well both independently and as part of a team. ‚Ä¢	Are excited to work at a small company with a variety of different responsibilities. Please note that we work with ongoing selection and that the position may be filled before the last application date, therefore we encourage you to apply for the position today. Our range of services comprises recruitment, temporary staffing and training, and our clients are primarily active within the industrial and IT/Tech fields. Our focus is on matching skillsets with companies in development, as well as finding and creating the workforce of the future. We are a hub for talented people of various ages, experience levels, and skill sets who want to take the next step in their careers. A talent hub, quite simply.

description.text:
This might be the perfect next step in your career! About us
 ATG has some of Sweden‚Äôs biggest- and fastest-growing digital products, with hundreds of thousands of users every week. Together, we are working to achieve our goal of creating the world‚Äôs best gaming experience. ATG believes strongly in sustainable and fun gaming! We value Drive, Respect and Ownership in everything we do. We believe that with ambition, the right mindset, and eagerness to help achieve common goals that we will succeed in becoming the long-term partner for our customers. We develop premium Horse games, Sports games and Casino. We continuously improve to deliver a great user experience in terms of accessibility, intuitive usage of the digital platforms/webpages and friction-free services overall. AND we certainly believe in having fun together, voicing our ideas and collaboration to work towards the bigger values. Want to join the team? I see myself more as a coach than a manager and want to create the best conditions for you as a developer to grow here at ATG. If you want to work at a company where innovation and exploring new techniques are highly valued, then you should come and be a part of ATG and my team. During my spare time I‚Äôm engaged in Swedish Sea Rescue Society where I‚Äôm a volunteer helping those in need with towing and medical care if needed. Looking forward to meeting you on an interview! Who are you? We are looking for a senior React Native app developer who has several years‚Äô experience in app development and has a customer centric perspective. You like to build smart and engaging functionalities in your apps and are always looking for lifting the quality in everything you do. Our current apps at ATG for iOS and Android are built using React Native, so relevant experience in javascript and/or typescript programming languages are a must to succeed in this role! We also use redux and redux-saga for managing state in our app. Future development can also include usage of GraphQL, together with apollo-client. Furthermore, you are also a developer who is passionate about front-end design and you are keeping up with current and future trends in your field of work. We believe that you are a driven person who appreciates collaboration in- and cross-team to achieve common goals. Sharing knowledge is a no-brainer for you, and you thrive in a mentoring position. You are likely to have a university degree in computer science or similar, however you may also have enough talent to challenge experience. We speak many languages, but mainly use Swedish. About recruitment process:
Please note that all applications should go through our recruitment portal, so please apply accordingly. Personality and code tests and background checks are a part of the recruitment process. We apply 6 months probation period on all roles at ATG. We have made our media choice for recruitment and therefore avoid contact with advertisers or sellers of other recruitment services. Join the game! Help us create the world‚Äôs best gaming experience We are the gaming company looking to create the best gaming experience there is. Games, sport, excitement and experiences are our passion. Our many well-known products see us inviting customers worldwide to a world-class gaming experience. We want to be the creative hub that takes the industry into the future, which is why we are always encouraging each other to think on new lines and try out new things. We are engaged in a digital transformation, working with modern solutions in tech. Fired by a combination of curiosity, a clear forward-looking direction, and with the well-being of colleagues, customers and all of Sweden‚Äôs trotting and thoroughbred horses close to our hearts, we are building on what will soon be 50 years of history and driving the industry on into the future. Our different backgrounds, experiences and personalities mean we are growing together. At ATG, everyone is expected to work actively to take the company to new levels, drawing on their role. We take gaming seriously. And we take our customers‚Äô expectations and well-being seriously too, as well as your personal development and health.
